org.horrabin.horrorss
Class RssSlashModuleBean

java.lang.Object
  org.horrabin.horrorss.RssSlashModuleBean

public class RssSlashModuleBean
extends java.lang.Object

The RssSlashModuleBean object represents an Slash module of an RSS feed. Valid for RDF specification.

Author:
Fernando Fornieles
